title: Replace 'AR' placeholder logo with uploaded Vayutaksha Consultancy logo image

requirements.text: Save the uploaded Vayutaksha Consultancy logo image as a static frontend asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png and replace every occurrence of the 'AR' text/initials placeholder logo in the site (navigation bar in PortfolioNav.tsx, hero section in HeroSection.tsx, footer in App.tsx, and any other location rendering the 'AR' mark) with an tag referencing this static asset. Set appropriate alt text ('Vayutaksha Consultancy') and size the image to fit naturally in each context (e.g., ~40–48px height in the nav, larger in the hero).

quotes: Add this image in place of AR for company logo
I don't have copy right for my company as of now

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded logo image is saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png and served as a static asset.
The navigation bar no longer shows 'AR' initials or any text-based placeholder; instead it displays the logo image.
The hero section logo mark is replaced with the uploaded image where applicable.
The footer (if it contains the 'AR' mark) is updated to use the image.
All logo image elements have alt='Vayutaksha Consultancy'.
The logo renders at an appropriate size in each location without distortion.

constraints: Do not alter any files listed under frontend.immutablePaths.
Do not route the logo image through the backend — serve it exclusively as a static frontend asset.
Do not add any copyright or trademark symbol alongside the logo, as the user has stated they do not currently hold a registered trademark.
nonGoals: Redesigning or restyling the navigation bar or hero section beyond swapping the logo mark.
Generating a new or modified version of the logo — use the uploaded image as-is.
Adding any watermark, copyright notice, or IP disclaimer to the logo.
